name: Where is Scratch Cat Hiding?
description:
Link to play the Scratch 3.0 version:

https://turbowarp.org/483302814 (Main Scratch Account)

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/483576932/ (Alternate Scratch Account)

This game has been imported from Scratch via Project HTMLifier.

The original project initially got 95 hearts, 82 favorites, 7 remixes, and 1884 views.

Songs are made by Kevin McLeod and Silent Partner.

All Updates will be made via a Scratch Project.

CONTROLS:

Click and drag to move the clones around.

Click Scratch Cat to gain a point.

Click the S button to see your current score.

Click the R button to try again (WARNING: May break on Normal and/or Hard difficulties, trying to fix that).

Click the Red Octagon to restart the game (since there isn't a flag or stop button for html converted Scratch projects).
